name: Monstr (BlueThunder)
description:
Man why do all the monsters look alike ;). Can you find the monster that this arm belongs to? Maybe you need to see more than its arm, maybe you will get lucky and see its Huge eyes or its sharp claws. Try as long as you can.

Instructions :
Click on Individual tile to reveal part of the monsters body.
Scroll through all the monsters that this part might belong to.
If you find it click Confirm.
Reveal all the tiles and you will lose score, Choose the wrong monster and you will lose (3 Hearts to go).

More Info:
Small Game that I created for the Trijam. 
Making the monsters was pretty easy and fun. Do you wish to see the Sprites that I used comment below  , I will assemble them and add it as a downloadable.

Want to see more of my work? Follow my profile.
I make pixel art daily to imporve my skills you can follow me on twitter.
